attributes.action: pressurise the Immigration Nationality Directorate to full investigiate claims of abuse against foreign partners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Foreign spouses are abusing the laws of the country in order to make false claims to secure their future.

In light of this, we believe that the Immigration and Nationality Directorate, should investigate and commence an investigation immediately, which is affecting many other innocent persons in the United Kingdom, destroying family bonds, reputation and character. Those of us whom believe in justice and may have been affected by such accusations wish to make our opinions known.

The government and the Immigration Nationality Directorate should address their policies currently in place, with more through investigations and background checks.
